Events.Name: Keychain Contest
Events.Description: Collect and spend SummerSlam Keychains to earn up to 525,550 SummerSlam Coins!
Events.EventMarqueeText: Collect and spend SummerSlam Keychains to earn up to 525,550 SummerSlam Coins!

Methods.Description: Spend 1 SummerSlam Keychain
Obtain 1 SummerSlam Keychain

Events.Name: Gauntlet Blitz Faction Event!
Events.Description: Conquer the SummerSlam Revolt Gauntlet Blitz with your Faction to earn SummerSlam Coins and Dream Bags!
Events.EventMarqueeText: Conquer the SummerSlam Revolt Gauntlet Blitz with your Faction to earn SummerSlam Coins and Dream Bags!

Methods.Description: Defeat the boss in the SummerSlam Revolt Gauntlet Blitz Normal Mode with any NXT 2019 Superstars
Defeat the boss in the SummerSlam Revolt Gauntlet Blitz Normal Mode with any Shield SuperStars
Defeat all opponents in the SummerSlam Revolt Gauntlet Blitz Normal Mode!
Defeat the boss in the SummerSlam Revolt Gauntlet Blitz Normal Mode with Velveteen Dream "The Vainglorious One"
Defeat the boss in the SummerSlam Revolt Gauntlet Blitz Hard Mode with any NXT 2019 Superstars
Defeat the boss in the SummerSlam Revolt Gauntlet Blitz Hard Mode with any Shield SuperStars
Defeat all opponents in the SummerSlam Revolt Gauntlet Blitz Hard Mode!
Defeat the boss in the SummerSlam Revolt Gauntlet Blitz Hard Mode with Velveteen Dream "The Vainglorious One"
Defeat all opponents in the SummerSlam Revolt Gauntlet Blitz Hell Mode!
Defeat the boss in the SummerSlam Revolt Gauntlet Blitz Hell Mode with any Shield SuperStars
Defeat the boss in the SummerSlam Revolt Gauntlet Blitz Hell Mode with any NXT 2019 Superstars
Defeat the boss in the SummerSlam Revolt Gauntlet Blitz Hell Mode with Velveteen Dream "The Vainglorious One"

Events.Name: SummerSlam Revolt Contest
Events.Description: Make progress by earning SummerSlam Coins in Tours, Feud, Blitz, Faction, Showdown Tournaments and additional contests. Prizes include a chance to win a new Superstar, Velveteen Dream, Aleister Black, or Ricochet "NXT", and many more valuable items!
Events.EventMarqueeText: Make progress by earning SummerSlam Coins in Tours, Feud, Blitz, Faction, Showdown Tournaments and additional contests. Prizes include a chance to win a new Superstar, Velveteen Dream, Aleister Black, or Ricochet "NXT", and many more valuable items!

Methods.Description: Spend 1 SummerSlam Revolt Universal Turnbuckle
Obtain 1 SummerSlam Coin
Increase the talent of Aleister Black "Root of All Evil" by 1
Increase the talent of Velveteen Dream "The Vainglorious One" by 1
Increase the talent of Ricochet "The One and Only" by 1

Events.Name: NXT Talent Up Contest
Events.Description: Massive Talent Up to kick off the SummerSlam Revolt Event! Earn fuse-ups and BONUS points for increasing the talents of our 3 new NXT Superstars!
Events.EventMarqueeText: Massive Talent Up to kick off the SummerSlam Revolt Event! Earn fuse-ups and BONUS points for increasing the talents of our 3 new NXT Superstars!

Methods.Description: Increase the talent of Ricochet "NXT" by 1
Increase the talent of Aleister Black  "NXT" by 1
Increase the talent of Velveteen Dream "NXT" by 1
